Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class dds::peer::DataInstanceWriterImpl< T >

The DataInstanceWriter class takes care of writing a specific Topic instance. The instance is automatically unregistered once the DataInstanceWriter is destroyed.

Author:
Angelo Corsaro <mailto:angelo.corsaro@gmail.com>
Version:
1.0
